WorkItem.Description: Many tools find a nearest feature (like the nearest existing solar plant, or they find an intersecting feature, like the solar irradiance tools). For each of these tools, show all of the metadata for that nearest feature on the detailed report (as a small table of all feature attributes).
WorkItem.Summary: Add feature metadata details to Detailed Report

Comments.Message: Due to time constraints, we do not expect this feature will be included in the final release.
